oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Replication Data for: Native bee communities vary across three prairie ecoregions due to land use, climate, sampling method and bee life history traits
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kohler, Monica
Sturm, Ashton
Sheffield, Cory S.
Carlyle, Cameron N.
Manson, Jessamyn S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Data associated with a study investigating the effects of landuse on wild bee communities in Alberta, Canada. Files contain data on study locations and records for all bee specimens, as well as a file describing the data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Agricultural Sciences
Earth and Environmental Sciences
